description.value: You call upon the creatures of nature to come to your aid. You can spend 10 minutes in concert with nature to replace a spell you've prepared in one of your druid spell slots with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Animal] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Plant or Fungus] spell of the same rank.
